product_name: Smith Audible ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: With a classic teardrop aviator frame and advanced lenses, the women's Smith Audible ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses deliver style and coverage with enhanced color and clarity. ChromaPop lenses use a proprietary technology to optimize color and increase clarity and definition, enabling you to see the outside world with exceptional vibrance. Polarized glass lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Matte Black and Matte Silver frames feature platinum tinted lenses, ideal for bright days and direct sunlight. Matte Brown frames feature brown tinted lenses that enhance your vision in a wide range of light and weather conditions. Titanium frames feature adjustable silicone nose pads and out-of-sight spring hinges. The Smith Audible ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses feature hydrophilic Megol temple pads that get tacky when wet for grip during exercise and hot weather.
short_description: With a classic teardrop aviator frame and advanced lenses, the women's Smith Audible ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses deliver style and coverage with enhanced color and clarity.
